 Pag 120
 Diamond ratios of pigeons
```{r}
masses <- c(49, 76, 123, 163, 245, 424, 512, 802)
ranks  <- c(1,   2,   3,   4,   5,   6,   7,   8)
ranks  <- seq(1,8)
ranks  <- 1:8
ranks  <- 1:length(masses)


plot(masses ~ ranks)
plot(ranks , masses)
scatter.smooth(masses ~ ranks)


log.masses <- log(masses)

plot(log.masses ~ ranks)

plot(log(masses) ~ ranks)

plot(log10(masses) ~ ranks)

plot(sqrt(masses) ~ ranks)


plot(log.masses ~ c(1:8))

```


```{r}
76/49

mass.ratios <- masses[2:8]/masses[1:7]

hist(mass.ratios)

summary(mass.ratios)

masses[2:8]/masses[1:7]

mean(masses[2:8]/masses[1:7])

lm(log10(masses) ~ ranks)
lm((masses) ~ ranks)
```
